decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of cheap creatures and pump effects, utilizing Jeskai Ascendancy to buff up creatures and generate card advantage. By combining token generation with powerful pump spells like Jeskai Charm, the deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent and finish the game quickly. The deck also includes cards like Stoke the Flames and Retraction Helix for additional removal and disruption, while utilizing card draw like Dig Through Time to maintain card advantage and fuel its aggressive game plan.

The deck focuses on disrupting opponent's game plan through a combination of targeted discard spells, removal spells, and counterspells. It aims to control the board and stall the game until it can establish a dominant position with powerful planeswalkers like Ashiok and Elspeth. It also utilizes card draw spells like Dig Through Time and Treasure Cruise to maintain card advantage and find key pieces of its control strategy. The mana base is designed to support a variety of colored spells while ensuring consistent access to the necessary lands for each stage of the game.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of efficient and powerful creatures, backed up by combat tricks and removal spells. The key strategy is to play aggressive creatures like Soldier of the Pantheon, Siege Rhino, and Fleecemane Lion, while using cards like Abzan Charm and Gather Courage to protect them or push through extra damage. The deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain board presence, using its versatile creature suite and removal spells to secure victory. It combines speed and resilience to outpace and overpower opponents in Standard 1 vs 1 matches.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive approach. By using a combination of efficient creatures like Seeker of the Way, Mantis Rider, and Goblin Rabblemaster, along with burn spells like Lightning Strike and Stoke the Flames, the deck aims to apply pressure early in the game and maintain board control. The inclusion of cards like Jeskai Charm and Wingmate Roc provide additional versatility and power to help seal the game in the later stages. The deck also utilizes card draw with Dig Through Time to maintain momentum and outmaneuver the opponent.

The key concept of this deck is to apply early pressure with aggressive creatures like Siege Rhino and Butcher of the Horde, while controlling the board with removal spells like Crackling Doom and Lightning Strike. The deck also utilizes planeswalkers like Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker and Elspeth, Sun's Champion to provide additional threats and card advantage. The mana base is designed to support the three-color deck, allowing for consistency in casting spells across all three colors. Overall, the strategy focuses on a combination of aggression and control to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on utilizing strong creatures like Hornet Queen, Doomwake Giant, and Eidolon of Blossoms to apply constant pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Pharika, God of Affliction and Whip of Erebos to generate additional value and gain incremental advantages. The inclusion of cards like Courser of Kruphix and Sylvan Caryatid helps to ensure consistent mana production and card draw. By efficiently ramping up and deploying threats, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and maintain board presence throughout the game.

This Mardu Control deck focuses on controlling the board with removal spells like Crackling Doom, Chained to the Rocks, and Lightning Strike while also utilizing creatures like Butcher of the Horde and Goblin Rabblemaster to pressure the opponent. The deck also includes some lifegain and card advantage through cards like Seeker of the Way and Wingmate Roc. The planeswalkers, Sarkhan and Sorin, provide additional threats and utility. Overall, this deck aims to control the game through removal and powerful creatures, ultimately overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggression and disruption.

The main concept of this Mardu Control deck is to maintain control of the board by using removal spells like Crackling Doom, Chained to the Rocks, Murderous Cut, and Lightning Strike. It also utilizes powerful creatures like Butcher of the Horde, Goblin Rabblemaster, and Wingmate Roc to pressure opponents and finish the game. The deck includes cards like Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker and Sorin, Solemn Visitor to provide additional threats and support. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt opponents while presenting a strong board presence to secure victory.

The main concept of this Dimir Control deck is to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's strategy through a combination of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Despise, removal spells like Bile Blight and Hero's Downfall, as well as counterspells like Dissolve. The deck also aims to generate card advantage through Treasure Cruise and Dig Through Time, while utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver for additional disruption and Prognostic Sphinx for card selection. The deck's win condition primarily revolves around outlasting the opponent and grinding them out through attrition.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay using a combination of efficient creatures like Fleecemane Lion, Siege Rhino, and Wingmate Roc, along with powerful removal spells like Hero's Downfall and Abzan Charm. The deck also includes some disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Sorin, Solemn Visitor, to help control the board and protect its threats. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color strategy, with a mix of dual lands and mana-fixing cards. The overall goal is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent while maintaining a strong board presence.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, utilizing the efficient mana base of Temur colors. The key strategy is to play threats early on with mana accelerants like Rattleclaw Mystic and Elvish Mystic, followed by pump spells like Temur Charm and Crater's Claws to push for lethal damage. Stubborn Denial provides protection for your creatures while the versatile Temur Charm can serve as removal or a combat trick. The deck's versatility and ability to apply pressure from multiple angles make it a formidable force in the Standard 1 vs 1 format.

The main concept of this Mardu Control deck is to maintain control of the board through a combination of removal spells and powerful creatures. By utilizing cards like Murderous Cut, Crackling Doom, and Lightning Strike to deal with threats, while deploying threats like Butcher of the Horde, Wingmate Roc, and Goblin Rabblemaster to pressure the opponent, the deck aims to control the game tempo and outvalue the opponent in the long run. The mana base consists of a combination of lands that provide access to all three colors of mana necessary for the deck.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with aggressive creatures like Savage Knuckleblade, Stormbreath Dragon, and Polukranos, World Eater. By utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Elvish Mystic and Rattleclaw Mystic, the deck aims to ramp up to powerful threats early on. Additionally, the deck includes versatile spells like Lightning Strike, Stubborn Denial, Temur Charm, and Crater's Claws to control the board and deal damage efficiently. The combination of speed, power, and flexibility makes this deck a formidable force in Standard 1 vs 1 matches.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of removal spells, hand disruption, and powerful creature threats. By using cards like Thoughtseize and Hero's Downfall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while deploying threats like Brimaz, King of Oreskos and Wingmate Roc to maintain board presence. Sorin, Solemn Visitor provides additional card advantage and life gain, while Seeker of the Way and Herald of Torment offer versatility in combat situations. The deck's mana base ensures consistent access to both black and white mana sources.

The deck focuses on putting pressure on the opponent with a mix of powerful creatures like Siege Rhino, Brimaz, and Wingmate Roc, supported by removal spells like Thoughtseize, Hero's Downfall, and Abzan Charm. The planeswalkers Liliana Vess and Sorin, Solemn Visitor provide additional value and utility. The deck features a solid mana base with a mix of dual lands to ensure consistent casting of its spells. The goal is to establish board presence early and maintain pressure throughout the game, while disrupting the opponent's plans with removal and hand disruption.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of powerful creatures and removal spells. By utilizing cards like Butcher of the Horde, Goblin Rabblemaster, and Stormbreath Dragon alongside removal spells like Bile Blight, Crackling Doom, and Hero's Downfall, the deck aims to quickly take control of the board and keep the opponent's threats in check. The inclusion of cards like Elspeth, Sun's Champion and Sorin, Solemn Visitor provide additional value and inevitability in the late game, allowing the deck to out-grind opponents and secure victory.
